GET /accounts/{account_id}/dlp/profiles.description: Lists all DLP profiles in an account.

allowed_match_count.description: Related DLP policies will trigger when the match count exceeds the number set.

context_awareness.description: Scan the context of predefined entries to only return matches surrounded by keywords.

enabled.description: If true, scan the context of predefined entries to only return matches surrounded by keywords.

skip.description: Content types to exclude from context analysis and return all matches.

files.description: If the content type is a file, skip context analysis and return all matches.

updated_at.description: When the profile was lasted updated

context_awareness.description: Scan the context of predefined entries to only return matches surrounded by keywords.

enabled.description: If true, scan the context of predefined entries to only return matches surrounded by keywords.

skip.description: Content types to exclude from context analysis and return all matches.

files.description: If the content type is a file, skip context analysis and return all matches.

id.description: The id of the predefined profile (uuid)

name.description: The name of the predefined profile
